title: JobConscious Website Redesign
description: Launched the first stable version with core features.

title: Final Pitch Presented at MSU Contest
description: JobConscious was formally pitched at the final round of Montclair State University’s 2019 Pitch Contest, showcasing the business model and vision to a panel of judges.

title: Passed Preliminary Round of Pitch Contest
description: JobConscious advanced in Montclair State University’s 2019 Pitch Contest during the preliminary round.
